com.foreach.imageserver.client

Class RemoteImageServerClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.imageserver.client.AbstractImageServerClient
      • com.foreach.imageserver.client.RemoteImageServerClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageServerClient

    public class RemoteImageServerClient
extends AbstractImageServerClient
    Represents a client for a remote ImageServer endpoint.

      • convertImage

        public ImageConvertResultDto convertImage(ImageConvertDto convertDto)
        Description copied from interface: ImageServerClient
        Convert given new or existing image using the given series of transformations. The list of transformations contains of all the transformations you want to execute on the image. These will be executed in the supplied order.
        Parameters:
        convertDto - image and transformations
        Returns:
        transformed images
